544850.name: Fantasy Grounds - Slipstream: Heart of Steel (Savage Worlds)
544850.description:
Heart of Steel

Savage Worlds Slipstream Adventure for Fantasy Grounds II
When your intrepid band of Streamers comes across the floating shell of a spaceship, how involved could it get? From that one simple discovery comes a parade of adventure-love and betrayal, secret police and hidden gardens, endless night and technophobia, robots and fungus-fit for any spacefaring crew.
Heart of Steel is converted from a 24-page trek by Umberto Pignatelli for Savage Worlds Slipstream setting. It is meant for Novice characters and is best for a group that already owns or has control of a rocket ship.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Savage Worlds
v3 Ruleset and the SlipStream Setting for Fantasy Grounds
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Grimm Gunthar
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Grimm Gunthar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
